title: Designation or change of registered agent
context: ยง414D-72 Designation or change of registered agent. (a) A corporation that does not already have a registered agent shall designate its registered agent by complying with section 425R-4. (b) A corporation may change its registered agent by complying with section 425R-7. &copy; If the registered agent changes its name, address, or type or jurisdiction of organization, the agent shall comply with the requirements of section 425R-8 or 425R-9, whichever is applicable. [L 2001, c 105, pt of ยง1; am L 2002, c 130, ยง41; am L 2012, c 58, ยง6]
